name: AMERICAN PROPERTY CASUALTY INSURANCE ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: General cybersecurity as it relates to autonomous vehicles. S. 1885 American Vision for Safer Transportation through Advancement of Revolutionary Technologies Act; H.R. 3388 SELF Drive Act; general data breach issues.
